com.virginmoneygiving.connect.sdk.v1
Class ConnectFundraiserAPI

java.lang.Object
  com.virginmoneygiving.connect.sdk.v1.ConnectFundraiserAPI

public final class ConnectFundraiserAPI
extends java.lang.Object

Provides access to the VMG /fundraisers/v1/ API methods.

public ConnectFundraiserAPI(java.net.URL baseUrl,
                            ApiConsumerDetails apiConsumerDetails)
                     throws VMGSDKException
Constructor.

Parameters:
baseUrl - The base URL of the Virgin Money Giving api you wish to access, e.g. http://api.virginmoneygiving.com. This class will append any neccessary URI details onto this value when making calls
apiConsumerDetails - Your API Consumer details, consisting of your API Key value.
Throws:
VMGSDKException
Method Detail

createFundraiserAccount

public CreateFundraiserAccountAPIResponse createFundraiserAccount(FundraiserAccount fundraiserAccount)
                                                           throws VMGSDKException,
                                                                  java.io.IOException
Create a new fundraiser account via a POST API call to "/fundraisers/v1/newaccount".

Parameters:
fundraiserAccount - This is the request object with the details of the account you wish to create
Returns:
Response object from the API
Throws:
VMGSDKException - If a validation error is encountered
java.io.IOException - If an error occurs during the API call.

createFundraisingPage

public CreateFundraisingPageAPIResponse createFundraisingPage(java.lang.String fundraiserResourceId,
                                                              java.lang.String accessToken,
                                                              FundraiserPage fundraiserPage)
                                                       throws VMGSDKException,
                                                              java.io.IOException
Create a new page for an existing fundraiser account via a POST API call to "/fundraisers/v1/account/secure/.../newpage".

Note - OAuth authentication token will be required to perform this call. Please refer to the online developer documentation for more details.

Parameters:
fundraiserResourceId - Resource Id of the fundraiser you wish to create a page for. This can be obtained from a search via searchFundraisers(com.virginmoneygiving.connect.sdk.v1.beans.fundraiser.request.FundraiserSearchCriteria) or in the response to the createFundraiserAccount(com.virginmoneygiving.connect.sdk.v1.beans.fundraiser.request.FundraiserAccount) method }.
fundraiserPage - This is the request object with fundraiser page details
accessToken - This is the authorisation token that is neccessary to create the fundraising page. This is obtained from the response to a successful fundraiser account creation, or in the response to the Oauth call.
Returns:
The response received from the API service.
Throws:
VMGSDKException - If a validation error is encountered
java.io.IOException - If an error occurs during the API call.

validateFundraiserUrl

public ValidateUrlAPIResponse validateFundraiserUrl(java.lang.String urlToValidate)
                                             throws VMGSDKException,
                                                    java.io.IOException
Validates a fundraiser URL via a GET API call to "/fundraisers/v1/urls" and indicates whether or not it already exists.

Parameters:
urlToValidate - The URL to check availability for - this is the final part of the url, e.g 'MyNewUrl' rather than 'http://virginmoneygiving.com/MyNewUrl'.
Returns:
Response object from the API
Throws:
VMGSDKException - If a validation error is encountered
java.io.IOException - If an error occurs during the API call.

Returns:
Response object from the API

VMGSDKException - If a validation error is encountered

getFundraiserAccount

public GetFundraiserAPIResponse getFundraiserAccount(java.lang.String fundraiserResourceId)
                                              throws VMGSDKException,
                                                     java.io.IOException
Retrieves details for a single fundraiser account via a GET API call to "/fundraisers/v1/account".

Parameters:
fundraiserResourceId - Resource Id of the fundraiser to return, This can be obtained from a search via searchFundraisers(com.virginmoneygiving.connect.sdk.v1.beans.fundraiser.request.FundraiserSearchCriteria) or in the response to the createFundraiserAccount(com.virginmoneygiving.connect.sdk.v1.beans.fundraiser.request.FundraiserAccount) method }.
Returns:
The response received from the API service.

getFundraisingPageDetails

public GetFundraisingPageDetailsAPIResponse getFundraisingPageDetails(java.lang.String fundraiserResourceId,
                                                                      java.lang.String pageId)
                                                               throws VMGSDKException,
                                                                      java.io.IOException
Retrieves page details for a single fundraiser page via a GET API call to "/fundraisers/v1/accounts/....../pages/...".

Parameters:
fundraiserResourceId - Resource Id of the fundraiser to return, This can be obtained from a search via searchFundraisers(com.virginmoneygiving.connect.sdk.v1.beans.fundraiser.request.FundraiserSearchCriteria) or in the response to the createFundraiserAccount(com.virginmoneygiving.connect.sdk.v1.beans.fundraiser.request.FundraiserAccount) method }.
pageId - Id of the page to retrieve, this can be obtained in the results of a call to getFundraiserAccount(String).
Returns:
The response received from the API service.
Throws:
VMGSDKException - If a validation error is encountered
java.io.IOException - If an error occurs during the API call.
